display.title: Rock Crushing
display.description: A Rock Crusher Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, 4 Amethyst Shards, Crying Obsidian, & Lodestone onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 4x Amethyst Shard 1x Crying Obsidian 1x Lodestone | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
